column1: The Pekan District is a district in Pahang
column2: Malaysia. Located in the east of Pahang
column3: the district bordered Kuantan District on the north
column4: South China Sea on the east
column5: Maran District on the west and Rompin District on the south.

column1: The following is based on Department of Statistics Malaysia 2010 census.
